document.title: Simple Upper Arch Aligner Treatment
document.summary: Simple aligner case focusing on the upper arch. Expected duration is 4–6 months with remote monitoring. Some attachments will be utilized to aid in tooth movement. Whitening is included.
key_points: Simple case involving clear aligners for the upper arch.
Some attachments required for tooth movement.
Whitening included in the treatment package.
next_steps: Initiate remote monitoring setup for the patient.
Schedule follow-up reviews as per remote monitoring outcomes.
